ROW.NAME: 资产详情
ROW.COLLIST: a.DAT "单据日期",a.CARDID "卡片编号",a.YZCID "原资产编号",(select name from V_STC_BUYER where id=a.ZCTYPNAM) "资产分类名称",(select name from V_STC_BUYER where id=a.ZCNAM) "资产名称",a.YSXMID "预算项目编号",(select name from V_STC_BUYER where id=a.GETWAY) "取得方式",(select name from V_STC_BUYER where id=a.PRITYP) "价值类型",(select name from V_STC_BUYER where id=a.ZJSTAT) "折旧状态",a.GGTYP "规格型号",a.PROFACT "生产厂家",a.BRAND "品牌",(select name from V_YESNO where id=a.XTZC) "信通资产"
